Name: Marmarita
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of marmite (yeast extract) rim.
Review: A Margarita with a Marmite rim. After all, yeast extract is slightly salty.
History: Created in 2005 by Simon (Ginger) Warneford at Blanch House, Brighton, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Marmarita contains 204 calories
